title: Creating Resilient Communities
content: For release on delivery   12:30 p.m. EDT   April 12, 2013            Creating Resilient Communities      Remarks by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Resilience and Rebuilding for Low-Income Communities:     Research to Inform Policy and Practice”    Federal Reserve System Community Affairs Research Conference    Washington, D.C.          April 12, 2013
